question: On which highland is Jihlava, Czech Republic located?
asked_question_translated: Em que planalto se situa Jihlava, na República Checa?
answer: Jihlava se situa no Planalto da Boêmia-Morávia (Českomoravská vrchovina).
answer_translated_eng: Jihlava se situa no Planalto da Boêmia-Morávia (Bohemian-Moravian Highlands).
